title: 加州橡树岭高中社会学实验课堂

action: Sit quietly at desk and observe classroom
thoughts: First day of this sociology experiment. I should follow the rules carefully and make a good impression. The classroom looks formal with the flags and uniforms. I wonder what the daily pledge will be like.
memory: Noticed classroom formality with flags and uniforms
Preparing to follow all experiment rules carefully
Curious about the daily pledge ceremony

action: Sit up straight and stop fidgeting, maintaining forward gaze toward teacher
thoughts: The whispering is making me nervous. The armband students are watching and taking notes. I should follow the rules and avoid any trouble to maintain good standing.
memory: Noticed classmates whispering despite rules
Decided to maintain proper posture and silence to avoid discipline
Aware of authority observation through window and armband students

action: Continue maintaining proper posture while discreetly adjusting uniform collar for comfort
thoughts: The uniform is still bothering me, but I need to stay focused and follow the rules. Everyone else is being so disciplined - I don't want to stand out or lose points.
memory: Cares about rules
Wants social acceptance
Pays attention to authority

action: Maintain proper posture while discreetly observing the teacher's approach to the daily pledge ceremony
thoughts: The teacher is probably about to start the daily pledge. I need to be ready to participate properly to maintain good standing and avoid losing discipline points. Everyone seems tense but I should focus on following the rules correctly.
